title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3696/86 of 3 December 1986 extending the period of validity of Regulation (EEC) No 2826/77 introducing a Community transit declaration form for use in automatic or electronic data-processing systems
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3696/86
of 3 December 1986
extending the period of validity of Regulation (EEC) No 2826/77 introducing a Community transit declaration form for use in automatic or electronic data-processing systems
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In the second paragraph of Article 5 of Regulation (EEC) No 2826/77, '31 December 1986' is hereby replaced by '31 December 1987'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1987.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 December 1986.
For the Commission
COCKFIELD
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 38, 9. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 179, 11. 7. 1985, p. 6.
(3) OJ No L 333, 24. 12. 1977, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 287, 31. 10. 1984, p. 7.
